DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: Fugitive German Tycoon Reportedly in Iran : Jurgen Schneider , a real_estate magnate who vanished without a trace in April and left_behind more_than $ 3.3 billion in debts , is hiding in Iran after paying hundreds of thousands of dollars to the Iranian government , the Sunday Times reported.The paper said bankers in Germany ' s financial capital , Frankfurt , had been told of Schneider ' s whereabouts and that he had been seen in the Iranian_capital Tehran . German investigators discovered Schneider had prepared his hide-out in_advance and paid " millions of deutsch marks to the Iranian authorities , " the paper added . Schneider is wanted by German police for alleged fraud .
